means: 屠杀，杀戮，屠宰( slaughter的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Is there really morally any difference between slaughtering a cow for food and a horse for food?
sentence.Network_cn: 为获得食物宰杀一头牛与一匹马，从道义上讲真的有区别吗？

sentence.Network_en: The Revolutionary Tribunal went to work, and a steady slaughtering began.
sentence.Network_cn: 革命法庭投入工作, 持续不断的大屠杀开始了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: in fact , she now adamantly opposes the slaughtering of innocent babies .事实上，她如今坚决反对对无辜婴儿的屠杀行为。
Officials there have begun slaughtering flocks near where infected dead swans were found ., 那里的官员开始在发现天鹅死亡地点的附近地区屠宰家禽.

list.abs: 皮革加工工艺流程 ... Pigment finish 颜料涂饰剂 Slaughter house 屠宰场 Topping 顶层涂饰.
政府部门常用英汉辞汇：劳工_翻译家... ... slag 熔渣 slaughter house 屠房 sleeper 枕木.
slaughtering 屠宰slaughtering weight 屠宰体重sleeping bud 休眠芽
studies on the slaughter performance and meat quality of boer crossbred goats ., 波杂肉羊屠宰性能及肉品质研究.
shipping tax 船舶税slaughtering tax 屠宰税social security tax 社会保险税

entry.def: If large numbers of people or animals are slaughtered, they are killed in a way that is cruel or unnecessary.

example.ex: Thirty four people were slaughtered while queuing up to cast their votes...
example.tran: 有 34 人在排队投票时遭到残杀。

example.ex: Whales and dolphins are still being slaughtered for commercial gain.
example.tran: 仍然有人为了商业利益大肆捕杀鲸鱼和海豚。

entry.def: To slaughter animals such as cows and sheep means to kill them for their meat.

example.ex: Lack of chicken feed means that chicken farms are having to slaughter their stock.
example.tran: 鸡饲料的缺乏意味着养鸡场将不得不杀掉饲养的鸡。

auth_sentence.content: He says pro-government forces are slaughtering soldiers who defect from the army.
auth_sentence.res_content: He says pro-government forces are slaughtering soldiers who defect from the army.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He says pro-government forces are slaughtering soldiers who defect from the army.

auth_sentence.res_content: He has been slaughtering animals the halal way since he was a young boy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has been slaughtering animals the halal way since he was a young boy.

auth_sentence.content: The opposition accused the regime of slaughtering the men because they were Sunni Muslims.
auth_sentence.res_content: The opposition accused the regime of slaughtering the men because they were Sunni Muslims.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The opposition accused the regime of slaughtering the men because they were Sunni Muslims.
